bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead, Pad-Mounted, Dry-Vault, and Submersible Automatic Line Sectionalizers for AC Systems
IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead, Pad-Mounted, Dry-Vault, and Submersible Automatic Line Sectionalizers for AC Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to all overhead, pad-mounted, dry-vault, and submersible single-pole or multipole ac automatic line sectionalizers for rated maximum voltages above 1000 V. It covers service conditions, ratings, design tests, production tests, and construction requirements.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
